file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 32-20-04-02 - NOSE LANDING GEAR SPRING CARTRIDGE - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL NOSE LANDING GEAR SPRING CARTRIDGE - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedure to restore the nose landing gear (NLG) spring assembly. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY NLG SPRING ASSEMBLY - RESTORA- ALL 32-20-04-900-801-A TION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 32-20-04 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 32-20-04-900-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. NLG SPRING ASSEMBLY - RESTORATION A. General (1) Refer to the latest revision of Component Maintenance Manual (CMM) 32-21-20 to restore the NLG spring assembly. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION HYDRAULIC SYSTEM - PRESSURIZATION WITH AMM TASK 29-10-00-860-802-A/200 EMDP SAFETY PIN OF THE NLG DOORS SOLENOID AMM TASK 32-00-02-910-801-A/200 VALVE - INSTALLATION AND REMOVAL SPRING ASSEMBLIES OF THE NOSE LANDING AMM TASK 32-20-04-000-801-A/400 GEAR - REMOVAL SPRING ASSEMBLIES OF THE NOSE LANDING AMM TASK 32-20-04-400-801-A/400 GEAR - INSTALLATION SB145-32-0036 - C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended Not Applicable I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-003-A (1) For aircraft PRE-MOD SB145-32-0036, make sure that the pressure in hydraulic system No. 1 is fully released ( AMM TASK 29-10-00-860-802-A/200). (2) For aircraft POST-MOD SB145-32-0036, install safety pin of the NLG doors solenoid valve (AMM TASK 32-00-02-910-801-A/200). (3) Remove the NLG spring assembly ( AMM TASK 32-20-04-000-801-A/400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 900-801-A/200 32-20-04 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Restore NLG Spring (Figure 201) SUBTASK 900-003-A (1) Refer to the latest revision of the LIEBHERR CMM 32-21-20 to restore the NLG spring assembly. K. Follow-on (Figure 201) SUBTASK 842-003-A (1) Install the NLG spring assembly ( AMM TASK 32-20-04-400-801-A/400). (2) For aircraft POST-MOD SB145-32-0036, remove safety pin of the NLG doors solenoid valve (AMM TASK 32-00-02-910-801-A/200). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 900-801-A/200 32-20-04 Page 3 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
